sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import logo from './logo.png'; // Adjust the path to your logo import electronicsIcon from './electronics.png'; import appliancesIcon from './appliances.png'; import mechanicsIcon from './mech.png'; function App() { const [page, setPage] = useState('home'); // Control which page is shown: 'home', 'login', 'signup', 'about', 'community' const handleNavigate = (targetPage) => { setPage(targetPage); }; const handleFormSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Prevent default form behavior setPage('community'); // Navigate to the Community page }; return (
{page === 'home' && (

Welcome to SkillShare - Dearborn!

Register as a Resident or Log In Below:

)} {page === 'about' && (

About Us

Welcome to SkillShare Dearborn, a community-driven platform dedicated to fostering sustainability, skill-sharing, and environmental consciousness through collaborative repair events.

Join us to learn new skills, save money, and contribute to a more environmentally friendly Dearborn!

)} {page === 'community' && (

Find a Community Repair Forum

Electronics

Home Appliances

Mechanics

)} {page === 'signup' && (

Sign Up Here!

)} {page === 'login' && (

Log In

)}
); } export default App;
